The Billboard Hot 100 Artist Explorer

A Tableau dashboard for music lovers

I love music, and I love learning the stories of how artists get their "big break", reach the peak of their popularity, and eventually release their last big hit. Using Billboard Hot 100 chart data from Dhruvil Dave on Kaggle, I created a Tableau Dashboard to learn what songs made my favorite musicians famous, from ABBA to ZZ Top, from 1958 to 2021 (the last update of this data extract).
